resources.string: Please fill out all required fields
Network error: please check you are online.
Sorry, this device does not support sending files over Bluetooth.
You can share this app offline. On the device that you want to share with: \n1. Open Settings > Bluetooth Settings. \n2. Make sure that the device is visible.
Password should be at least 5 characters
Download educational videos, articles and interactive exercises for later use.
Share content at high speed with any other user nearby.
This app requires the location permission to enable high-speed offline sharing with nearby users.

This app uses Bluetooth and WiFi scanning to find other users nearby. The app can then connect to nearby users to download content at high-speed without requiring Internet access. Because these scan results could be used to determine your location, you must grant the location permission to enable this feature. This app does not save the results of these scans and does not record your location in any way. This app is built from open source code which can be checked at github.com/UstadMobile/UstadMobile

Ustad Mobile - Offline Open Educational Resources
Access and share educational content offline

Ustad Mobile is an open-source app that enables users to access a wide variety of open educational resources, online or offline. Both the app and content can be shared offline between devices.
 
 Ustad Mobile features openly licensed content from some of the Internet's leading Open Educational Resources (OER) sites:
 
 African Story Books
 ETakkatho
 Global Digital Library
 Khan Academy (including offline access to both videos and exercises)
 PHET
 Pratham Books
 Voice of America
 
 Content is provided under license by external content providers. Ustad Mobile, unless explicitly mentioned otherwise, is not endorsed by any such content provider.
